solver.propagation.hardcoded

Class SevenQueuesPropagatorEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.propagation.hardcoded.SevenQueuesPropagatorEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IPropagationEngine

    public class SevenQueuesPropagatorEngine
extends Object
implements IPropagationEngine
    This engine is priority-driven constraint-oriented seven queues engine.
    On a call to onVariableUpdate, it stores the event generated and schedules the propagator in one of the 7 queues wrt to its priority for future revision.


    Since:
    05/07/12
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
